name: MTLCompileOptions
desc: Compilation settings for a Metal shader library.

items.name: var fastMathEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the compiler can perform optimizations for floating-point arithmetic that may violate the IEEE 754 standard.

items.name: var preserveInvariance: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the compiler should compile vertex shaders conservatively to generate consistent position calculations.

items.name: var languageVersion: MTLLanguageVersion
items.desc: The language version used to interpret the library source code.

items.name: var preprocessorMacros: [String : NSObject]?
items.desc: A list of preprocessor macros to apply when compiling the library source.

items.name: var libraryType: MTLLibraryType
items.desc: The kind of library to create.

items.name: var installName: String?
items.desc: For a dynamic library, the name to use when installing the library.

items.name: enum MTLLibraryType
items.desc: A set of options for Metal library types.
